about_the_game:
Your goal is to arrange the tiles so that their symbols match the symbols on the adjacent tiles. Once you have achieved this, black lines will appear to indicate the correct placement of the tiles. By playing and thinking about the solution, you will either relax or... get frustrated. It depends on how good you are at solving puzzles. And you must know that I have prepared several puzzles that will take you more time to solve.
Good luck.

:)

Features:
- Two visual modes to choose from.
- You don't have to rush in this game.
- Challenging puzzles.
- Calm music.
- Pleasant sounds.
- Dozens of levels to solve.
- A few mechanics to figure out.
- You can play with a mouse, keyboard or pad.
- The game should run even on your grandmother's computer.
